title: What are your leave options from work if illness strikes your household this winter?
description: Force majeure, medical leave, compassionate leave: employees should familiarise themselves with their rights to ensure they follow the rules and, if possible, are not left out of pocket
content: Winter is here and so are the coughs, colds and caring emergencies that mean days off work. If your child has a tummy bug, you have the flu, your mums had a fall or your housemate needs a hospital pi… [+10874 chars]
